safaris.title: 3 Days Maasai Mara Safari
safaris.description: A classic short safari covering Kenya's most famous reserve.

days.title: Arrival & First Game Drive
days.description: Transfer from Nairobi Hotel to Wilson Airport for a 45-minute flight to Masai Mara. Arrival transfer to camp for lunch. Afternoon game drive with expert guide.

days.title: Full Day Game Viewing
days.description: Early morning game viewing followed by breakfast. Morning game drive. Lunch then siesta. Afternoon game drive.

days.title: Departure
days.description: Early game viewing then transfer to airstrip for flight back to Nairobi and hotel transfer.

categories.title: Kenya Excursions
categories.description: Half-day and full-day excursions in Nairobi and Mombasa

safaris.title: Nairobi City Tour
safaris.description: Take a guided tour of the city to visit the principal landmarks including Capitol Hill, National Museum with its paleontology hall, Snake Park, Railway Museum and City Market.

safaris.title: Karen Blixen, Giraffe Manor and Ostrich Park
safaris.description: Visit the home of former coffee farmer Karen Blixen, now preserved as a museum. Proceed to the Giraffe Manor where you can feed rare Rothschild giraffe. End the tour with a visit to the Ostrich Park.

safaris.title: Bomas of Kenya
safaris.description: Enjoy a cross-section of folk dances from various tribes in the country. Experience the culture as depicted by the recreated African villages with the chance to buy local handicrafts.

safaris.title: Nairobi National Park
safaris.description: Approximately 8 kilometers from the city centre, enter the Nairobi National Park to view lions, cheetahs, buffaloes, impala, giraffes and ostriches roaming in untouched savannah and indigenous forest.

safaris.title: Nairobi by Night
safaris.description: Dinner at a Brazilian style restaurant offering exotic grilled meat such as crocodile, zebra and chicken dishes, all roasted on a huge wood fire. Includes nightclub or casino visit.

safaris.title: Carnivore Experience
safaris.description: Guaranteed daily at 12.30pm and 7.00pm. Carnivore offers a variety of meat served in one meal including exotic and barbecue dishes.

safaris.title: Lake Naivasha and Crescent Island
safaris.description: Drive down the escarpment to Lake Naivasha. After a guided tour and buffet lunch beside the lake, enjoy a two-hour boat ride to Crescent Island to walk among plains game and birdlife.

safaris.title: Lake Nakuru National Park
safaris.description: Descend the escarpment into dramatic landscapes en route to Lake Nakuru, famous for flamingos and wildlife. Full park tour with lunch served inside the park.

safaris.title: Solio Ranch – Rhino
safaris.description: Drive through Kikuyu countryside to Outspan/Aberdare/Mt. Kenya Guest House. Next morning visit Solio Ranch, a unique sanctuary for black and white rhinos, lions, cheetahs and plains game. Picnic lunch included.

subcategories.title: Mombasa Excursions
subcategories.intro:
Mombasa is historical and the second largest city in Kenya with a population of 1 million. Lying on the Indian Ocean, it's a major sea port with an international airport. This is the centre of the coastal tourism industry. Mombasa city is a small Island separated from the main land by 2 creeks. The port serves both Kenya and neighboring land locked countries, linking them to the ocean.

Places of interest around Mombasa city:
a. Fort Jesus – overlooking the old port and built in 1593 to protect the port trade.
b. Bombolulu Workshops – founded by, and supporting the physically disabled.
c. Bamburi Nature Trails – Haller Park. Largest animal sanctuary in Mombasa.
d. The Mombasa Tusks – Built to commemorate Princess Margaret visit in 1956.
e. Mamba Village – Feed, feel and feed on crocodile delicacies.
f. Mombasa Marine Park.
g. Mombasa Old Town.
h. Rabai Museum – Christianity and modern learning built 1846 by missionaries.

safaris.title: 1 Day Mombasa City Tour
safaris.description: Take a guided city tour to visit principal landmarks including Akamba wood carving Village, a Hindu temple, Fort Jesus Museum, Old Town, Vegetable market and Biashara Street for shopping.

safaris.title: 1 Day Shimba Hills Tour
safaris.description: Situated 40 Kms from Mombasa drive past coconut, cashew nut and other plantations to Shimba Hills Reserve to view, amongst other animals, the rare sable and roan antelope. Lunch at a magnificent Lodge.

safaris.title: 1 Day Malindi and Gedi Ruins
safaris.description: Drive across the new Mtwapa and Kilifi bridges to visit the Gedi ruins. Continue to Malindi and view Marine life in a glass bottom boat at the Marine Park. After lunch in a local restaurant visit the snake farm and the falconry. En route to Mombasa have an optional stop at a local village.

safaris.title: Tamarind Dhow Dinner
safaris.description: A romantic Dhow Sundowner Cruise along the picturesque Island of Mombasa starts off an enchanting evening not to be missed. After docking at a private jetty, proceed to Fort Jesus for a sound-and-light presentation of the turbulent history of the East African Coast. A candle-lit dinner is served within the fortress by waiters in Portuguese attire.

safaris.title: 1 Day Tsavo National Park
safaris.description: Early morning drive 100 Km inland to Tsavo East National Park. Enter the park and start viewing game, stop at Aruba Dam en route to a lodge for lunch. After another game drive, return to Mombasa.

safaris.title: 2 Days Tsavo East
safaris.description:
Day 1: Morning drive to Bachuma Gate and enter Tsavo East Park, viewing game en route to Voi Safari Lodge / Sentrim / Ngulia / Aruba Ashnil for lunch.
Day 2: Early morning game drive. Relax and return to Mombasa after lunch.

safaris.title: 3 Days Tsavo East & West – Amboseli National Park
safaris.description:
Day 1: Drive 100 Kms east to Tsavo East/West Park, home to the Red Elephant. Afternoon game drive and overnight at Ngulia / Kilaguni / Sentrim.
Day 2: Proceed to Amboseli Park for lunch at Kibo / Sentrim / Serena. Afternoon game drive with chances to see Mt Kilimanjaro.
Day 3: Early morning game drive, breakfast, then return to Mombasa.

safaris.title: Kiwayuu / Kipungani Islands (Upon Request)
safaris.description: A choice of two get-away-from-it-all beach hideaways. Both are small and intimate with personalized service and excellent cuisine. Access is by air only from Nairobi or Mombasa. Full board at Kiwayuu Lodge.

safaris.title: Lamu Island (Upon Request)
safaris.description: This is Kenya's oldest living town with little change in appearance and character. Access is by boat or via the airstrip in nearby Manda Island. Places of interest include Swahili House Museum, Lamu Fort, Donkey Sanctuary, The beach, Matondoni Village, Shela Village, and Dhow trips. Accommodation options upon request.

safaris.title: 3 Days Zanzibar Island (Upon Request)
safaris.description:
Day 1: Fly via Mombasa to Zanzibar. Afternoon spice tour visiting clove plantations.
Day 2: Morning tour of Stone Town including market, Sultan's Palace and Museum. Afternoon boat trip for swimming and snorkeling.
Day 3: Guided shopping trip before transfer to airport. Accommodation upon request.

categories.title: Kenya Budget Safaris
categories.description: There are two types of Camping in Kenya.

safaris.title: Luxury Tented Camping
safaris.description: This type of Camping involves using custom made luxury tents for accommodation. These tented camps range between 2 star to 5 star ratings and have all inclusive amenities inside the tent. The only difference between a Lodge and these tents is only the roof that is of canvas.

safaris.title: Adventure Camping
safaris.description: This type of Camping safaris caters for the young at heart and for those who really love adventure whereby life's little luxuries such as flash toilets, running water or iced drinks come in handy. You can imagine being in an African bush with nothing between you and the animals except a sheet of canvas tent and the flames of a dying fire. Also imagine watching your cook prepare each and every meal as you watch and having the chance to show the group how good you are in the kitchen and having to share in the responsibilities of either cleaning the dishes or making the meals. Having spent the whole day watching different animals and their way of life e.g., the cats hunting and killing a prey and knowing you will be sleeping in the same bush with no fence or electricity and only having a flash light. This is camping adventure.

safaris.title: 2 Days AMBOSELI NATIONAL PARK
safaris.description: Day 1 Amboseli: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms 4hrs]. Full board at the camp. Day 2 Nairobi: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop of wild animals. After breakfast return to Nairobi.

safaris.title: 3 Days THE HEMINGWAY TRAIL - MAASAI MARA
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - MASAAI MARA: Drive south along the floor of the Great Rift Valley. Lunch at Narok and then climb the western wall entering the Hemingway country 'Serengeti Plains'. Arrive late afternoon at the Maasai Mara Game Reserve. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 MAASAI MARA: A full day spent game viewing across the rich, tree-studded grasslands and rolling hills. The famous Mara is renowned for its great herds of plains games, black maned lion, leopard and cheetah. It also has numerous elephant, virtually every type of wildlife to be found in Kenya. Full board at the camp. DAY 3 MAASAI MARA - NAIROBI: After breakfast, depart for Nairobi, enjoy a picnic lunch en-route and arrive in Nairobi late evening.

safaris.title: 3 Days THE BORN FREE SAMBURU SAFARI
safaris.description: DAY 1 SAMBURU: Early morning departure to the semi-desert north. Cross the equator, arriving at your lodge, where thorn bush gives way to acacia woodland and cascading springs. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 SAMBURU: Full day game viewing along the banks of the river adorned with doum palms and attracting big game. Full board at the camp. DAY 3 NAIROBI: After a hearty breakfast, leave for Nairobi, arriving before lunch.

safaris.title: 4 Days MAASAI MARA - NAKURU
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - MAASAI MARA: Leave Nairobi for Maasai Mara Game Reserve, picnic en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed to the camp, in search of black maned lion, elephant, leopard, cheetah, buffalo and other plains game. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 MAASAI MARA: Full day spent exploring this unique park which really forms the northern part of the Serengeti National Park. Full board at the camp. DAY 3 NAKURU: Depart after breakfast, have lunch in Narok town and later proceed to Lake Nakuru birds paradise arriving in good time for the afternoon game drive. Full board at the camp. DAY 4 NAKURU - NAIROBI: Pre breakfast game drive, have breakfast and later depart for Nairobi in the afternoon.

safaris.title: 6 Days MASAI MARA - LAKES NAKURU - BOGORIA - BARINGO
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - MASAI MARA: Drive south along the floor of the Rift Valley. Lunch is served en route, then pass Narok, climb the western wall entering Hemingway country 'Serengeti Plains'. Arrive late afternoon in the Maasai Mara Game Reserve. Full board at the Camp. DAY 2 MAASAI MARA: Full day spent in search of Elephants, Zebra, Wildebeest, Rhino, Buffalo, Lion, Cheetah, Leopard and other plains game. Full board at the camp. DAY 3 MAASAI MARA – NAKURU: After breakfast, leave the camp for Lake Nakuru, picnic en-route at the Safari junction. After Lunch, proceed to Lake Nakuru via Lake Elementaita stopping for panoramic and scenery viewing. You will arrive in Nakuru later in the afternoon. Dinner and overnight in Nakuru. DAY 4 NAKURU - LAKES BOGORIA & BARINGO: After an early pre morning game drive and breakfast, drive to Lake Baringo arriving in time for lunch, explore on foot this naturalist lakes and view birds in their thousands. Dinner and overnight in your hotel or camp. DAY 5 LAKE BARINGO: Full day in Baringo with a morning birds watching walk along the cliff walls. Lunch and afternoon boat ride in this fresh water lake and visit to traditional villages. Dinner and overnight at your Hotel or Camp. DAY 6 LAKE BARINGO – NAIROBI: After breakfast, return to Nairobi, arriving in the late afternoon.

safaris.title: 6 Days MASAI MARA - LAKE NAKURU - AMBOSELI
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - MAASAI MARA: Leave Nairobi for Maasai Mara Game Reserve, picnic lunch en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed for a game drive en route to the camp in search of black mane lions, elephant, cheetah, buffalo, and other plains game. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 MAASAI MARA: Full day in Maasai Mara on a full board at the Camp. DAY 3 NAKURU: Early morning game drive and leave for Nakuru National Park. Lunch en route. Afternoon game drive in this park famous for the big five and a million plus flamingos. Full board at your hotel. DAY 4 AMBOSELI: After breakfast, leave for Amboseli. Picnic lunch en-route. Afternoon game drive in the park with the possibility of seeing the big five, under the backdrop of the snow capped Mt. Kilimanjaro. Full board at the camp. DAY 5 AMBOSELI: Full day in Amboseli on a full board at the camp. DAY 6 AMBOSELI - NAIROBI: Early morning game drive and leave for Nairobi after breakfast, arriving late in the afternoon.

safaris.title: 6 Days MASAI MARA - LAKE NAKURU - SAMBURU
safaris.description: DAY 1 NAIROBI - MASAI MARA: Leave Nairobi for Masai Mara Game Reserve, picnic lunch en-route. On arrival at the game reserve, proceed for a game drive en route to the camp in search of black maned lions, elephant, cheetah, buffalo, and other plains game. Full board at the camp. DAY 2 MASAI MARA: Full day at Maasai Mara on a full board at the Camp. DAY 3 NAKURU: Early morning game drive and leave for Nakuru National Park. Lunch en route. Afternoon game drive in this park famous for the big five and a million plus flamingos. Full board at your hotel. DAY 4 SAMBURU: After breakfast, leave for Samburu. Picnic lunch en-route. Afternoon game drive in the park with the possibility of seeing the big cats. Full board at the camp. DAY 5 SAMBURU: Full day in Samburu on a full board basis at the Camp. DAY 6 SAMBURU - NAIROBI: Early morning game drive and leave for Nairobi after breakfast, arriving late in the afternoon.

safaris.title: 8 Days LAKE TURKANA SPECIAL SAFARI
safaris.description: Day 1 Nairobi/L. Baringo: Depart Nairobi in the morning stopping at the highest point of the Great Rift Valley. Lunch at Nakuru and arrive in L. Baringo in the late afternoon. Camp overnight at your campsite. Day 2 L. Baringo/Maralal: Climb out of the Rift Valley in the morning towards Maralal and the red ochred Samburu people still nomadic and proud. Full board at your campsite. Day 3 Maralal / Turkana: Break early in the morning for L. Turkana. Another spectacular climb leads you to Losiolo, descend down to Baragoi on your way to South Horr passing by a small stream; the rough road gets worse as we descend across ancient lava flows towards the Jade Sea and the Oasis Loiyangalani lying between the Lake and Mt. Kulal. Arrive in your permanent beach campsite soon after lunch and settle in the Turkana huts. Dinner and overnight in your campsite. Day 4 Turkana: Spend the day relaxing and bathing. A short boat excursion will follow to view crocodiles and other species of birds. You will also visit a Turkana Manyatta in the evening for traditional dances. Dinner and overnight in your camp. Day 5 Turkana/ Maralal: Drive up the Horr Valley back to Baragoi and proceed to camp in Maralal. Day 6 Maralal/Samburu: Drive to Samburu Game Reserve and settle by the canopy of trees in the Uaso Nyiro River campsite. Day 7 Samburu: Morning and afternoon game runs in Samburu. Full board in your campsite. Day 8 Samburu/Nairobi: After breakfast drive back to Nairobi with lunch in Nanyuki. Drop off clients who wish to climb Mt. Kenya. Arrival in Nairobi is late in the evening.

safaris.title: 8 Days TURKANA SCENIC SAFARI via CHALBI DESERT
safaris.description: Day 1 Nairobi/Samburu: Depart Nairobi in the morning for Samburu Game Reserve stopping in Nanyuki for lunch. You will pass through pleasant countryside with coffee and tea plantations providing a good view of Mt. Kenya. Game drive en route to your camp for dinner and overnight. Day 2 Samburu: Morning and afternoon game run in Samburu. Full board at your campsite. Day 3 Samburu/Marsabit: Early morning pre-breakfast game drive. After breakfast drive to Marsabit via the 'singing wells' of the Boran tribe. Late lunch at the camp. The afternoon will be at leisure. Dinner and overnight at your campsite. Day 4 Marsabit/Kalacha: After breakfast proceed on a game drive in the nearby Marsabit National Park including a stop at Lake Paradise, a natural water hole in the park. Drive on to Kalacha with picnic lunch en route. Dinner and overnight in your campsite in this tiny settlement at the edge of the Chalbi desert. Day 5 Kalacha/L. Turkana: After breakfast depart Kalacha for Loiyangalani, the south-eastern shore of L. Turkana. The afternoon will be at leisure after lunch on arrival. Dinner and overnight in the campsite. Day 6 L. Turkana: A full day by the shore of L. Turkana during which you can visit the El Molo tribesmen in their village. The El Molo are said to be the smallest tribe in Africa numbering less than 100 people. All meals and overnight at your camp. Day 7 L. Turkana/Maralal: After breakfast depart Loiyangalani for Maralal town, via pristine landscape and scenery. Lunch will be served en route. Dinner and overnight in your campsite in Maralal. Day 8 Maralal/Nairobi (via Thompson Falls): After breakfast depart for Nairobi via Thompson Falls with lunch en route. Arrive Nairobi in the early evening.

safaris.title: 9 Days BEST OF KENYA LANDSCAPE TOUR (upon Request)
safaris.description: Day 1 Nairobi/Nakuru: Proceed to Hells Gate National Park for a morning of trekking inside the park. Proceed after lunch to Kariandusi prehistoric site and then on to Hyrax Hill prehistoric site. Overnight in Nakuru camp. Day 2 L. Nakuru/Bogoria/Baringo: Pre-breakfast game run in L. Nakuru National Park. After breakfast, proceed to camp in Lake Baringo for dinner and overnight. Day 3 L. Baringo/Saiwa Swamp: Baringo to Cherangani hills via Marigat. Here you will have a chance to see the rare Sitatunga antelope. Overnight in Saiwa Swamp or Kitale hotel. Day 4 Saiwa Swamp/ Mt Elgon: From Saiwa swamp via Kitale, we head to Mt Elgon, the second highest in Kenya arriving in time for lunch. Time allowing you will visit the Kiptum caves in Mt. Elgon. Dinner and overnight at the campsite or the Bandas. Day 5 Mt Elgon/Kakamega Forest: Proceed after breakfast to Kakamega forest via Webuye. Lunch en route. Afternoon visit of the Kakamega forest. Dinner and overnight in your campsite or Bandas. Day 6 Kakamega Forest/Kisii: After breakfast proceed to Kisii. Arrive in time for lunch in Kisii. In the afternoon visit a soapstone curving center at Tabaka area. Dinner and overnight in Kisii hotel. Day 7 Kisii/Maasai Mara: After breakfast drive to Maasai Mara via Kilgoris. Game runs en route to your campsite for dinner and overnight. Day 8 Maasai Mara: Full day in Maasai Mara Game Reserve with picnic lunch. Dinner and overnight in your campsite. Day 9 Maasai Mara/Nairobi: After breakfast drive out of the Reserve with game run en route. Picnic lunch will be served on your return to Nairobi. Arrival in Nairobi is in the afternoon.

categories.title: Kenya Luxury Safaris
categories.description: Premium safari experiences with luxury accommodations

safaris.title: 2 Days AMBOSELI NATIONAL PARK
safaris.description: Day 1 Amboseli: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms, 4 hrs]. Day 2 Nairobi: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop for the wildlife. After breakfast return to Nairobi. Full board accommodations at Sentrim, Kibo or Kilima Amboseli.

safaris.title: 2 Days TREE HOTELS
safaris.description: Day 1 Nairobi: Drive through Thika and pineapple plantations, cross Tana River and climb into Kikuyu farmlands. Arrive for lunch at Aberdare Country Club/Outspan. Afternoon game drive in Aberdares National Park visiting floodlit waterholes and saltlicks. Day 2 Tree Hotel - Nairobi: Morning descent to base hotel and return to Nairobi in time for lunch. Full board accommodations at the Treetops or the Ark.

safaris.title: 3 Days AMBOSELI - TSAVO – MOMBASA
safaris.description: Day 1 Amboseli National Park: Explore Amboseli with an afternoon game drive at the foot of Kilimanjaro. Day 2 Tsavo West National Park: Game drive in Kenya's largest park, visit Mzima springs. Day 3 Mombasa: After breakfast, proceed to Mombasa where the tour ends by lunchtime. Full board accommodations at Kibo, Sentrim, or Kilima Amboseli and Kilaguni or Ngulia Lodges in Tsavo.

safaris.title: 3 Days MASAI MARA
safaris.description: Day 1 Masai Mara: Drive to the escarpment, descend into the Great Rift Valley to Narok. Enter Masai Mara for lunch, afternoon game drive, and overnight. Day 2 Masai Mara: Full day on the undulating hills and grasslands viewing antelopes, gazelles, lions, and other predators. Day 3 Nairobi: Depart for Nairobi arriving before lunch. Full board accommodations at SENTRIM/ASHNIL/MARA MAISHA or Ol Moran or Mara Leisure.

safaris.title: 3 Days THE BORN FREE SAFARI SAMBURU
safaris.description: Day 1 Samburu: Early morning departure to the semi-desert north, arriving at Shaba Lodge after crossing the equator [352 kms, 5 1/2 hrs]. Day 2 Samburu: Full day game viewing along the riverbanks. Day 3 Samburu/Nairobi: Return to Nairobi, arriving before lunch. Full board accommodations at Ashnil/Simba or Sarova Shaba or Simba Lodges.

safaris.title: 4 Days LAKE NAKURU - LAKE NAIVASHA - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Lake Nakuru, Lake Naivasha, Masai Mara
safaris.description: Day 1 Nakuru: Drive through tea and coffee plantations near Limuru, arrive at Lake Nakuru Park. Afternoon game drive, overnight at lodge. Day 2 Maasai Mara: Morning drive past Mt. Longonot, arrive at Maasai Mara for afternoon game drive and overnight. Day 3 Maasai Mara: Full day of game drive in the reserve. Day 4 Nairobi: Return to Nairobi before lunch. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Pelican Nakuru or Ol Moran/Sentrim/Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: 4 Days AMBOSELI - TSAVO - TAITA HILLS
safaris.description: Day 1 Amboseli: Drive south across the Athi plains to Amboseli. Game viewing en route to lodge [250 kms, 4 hrs]. Day 2 Tsavo: Cross Shetani Lava Flow to Tsavo West for game drive and overnight [105 kms, 2 hrs]. Day 3 Taita Hills: Drive to Taita Hills for game drive and overnight [90 kms, 1.5 hrs]. Day 4 Mombasa: After breakfast, drive to Mombasa, arrive for lunch. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Kilima/Kibo Amboseli and Ngulia or Sovereign Camp – Tsavo and Taita Hills.

safaris.title: 5 Days TREE HOTEL-SAMBURU-MT KENYA
safaris.description: Day 1 Tree Hotel: Morning drive through Kikuyu farmlands, afternoon game drive in Aberdares, overnight at base hotel [160 kms, 3 hrs]. Day 2 Samburu: Drive north to Samburu, afternoon game drive at Shaba Lodge [207 kms, 3.5 hrs]. Day 3 Samburu: Full day game viewing including rarer northern species. Day 4 Mt Kenya: Travel to cool slopes of Mt Kenya, overnight at Nanyuki lodge [137 kms, 0.5 hrs]. Day 5 Nairobi: Depart for Nairobi after breakfast, arriving by lunch [215 kms, 3 hrs]. Full board accommodations at Aberdare Country Club, Sentrim/Sopa Lodges, and Nanyuki Lodge.

safaris.title: 6 Days AMBOSELI - LAKE NAIVASHA - NAKURU - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Amboseli, Lake Naivasha, Nakuru, Masai Mara
safaris.description: Day 1 Amboseli: Drive south through Maasai country, afternoon game viewing beneath Kilimanjaro. Day 2 Amboseli: Dawn drive, leisure morning, afternoon game drive. Day 3 Lake Naivasha: Drive to Lake Naivasha with lunch enroute, afternoon at leisure. Day 4 Maasai Mara: Depart early, lunch at lodge, afternoon game drive. Day 5 Maasai Mara: Full day game viewing of black-maned lions and leopards. Day 6 Nairobi: Return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Kibo/Kilima Amboseli, Pelican/Sentrim Naivasha, and Sentrim/Ol Moran/Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: 6 Days SAMBURU - NAKURU - MASAI MARA
safaris.description: Day 1 Samburu: Morning drive through rolling agricultural land round Nyeri, cross the equator, arrive at Samburu lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [352 kms, 0.5 hrs]. Day 2 Samburu: Full day viewing elephants, lions, Gerenuk, Beisa Oryx, and crocodiles. Day 3 Nakuru: Drive through Aberdares to Nakuru Park, lunch and game drive, overnight [315 kms, 5 hrs]. Day 4 Maasai Mara: Continue across the valley to Maasai Mara, lunch, afternoon game drive [315 kms, 5 hrs]. Day 5 Maasai Mara: Full day game drive with photography opportunities of black-maned lions, cheetah, and leopard. Day 6 Nairobi: Return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Sopa Samburu, Sentrim/Flamingo Nakuru, Sentrim/Ol Moran or Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: 6 Days TREE HOTEL - SAMBURU - NAKURU & NAIVASHA - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Tree Hotel, Samburu, Nakuru, Naivasha, Masai Mara
safaris.description: Day 1 Nairobi - Tree Hotel: Drive through Kikuyu farmlands to Nyeri, lunch, afternoon game drive in Aberdares, overnight at base hotel. Day 2 Tree Hotel - Samburu: Descend into semi-desert Samburu, afternoon game drive, overnight at lodge. Day 3 Samburu: Full day exploring Samburu Reserve. Day 4 Samburu - Lake Nakuru/Lake Naivasha: Drive to Lake Nakuru with a stop at Thompson Falls, lunch, visit bird sanctuary, overnight at hotel or camp at Nakuru/Naivasha. Day 5 Maasai Mara: Early departure, lunch at lodge, afternoon game drive in Mara, overnight at lodge or tented camp. Day 6 Nairobi: Return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board accommodations at Aberdare Country Club, Sentrim/Sopa Lodges, Nakuru (Sentrim, Flamingo or Pelican), and Sentrim/Ol Moran or Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: 6 Days MASAI MARA / LAKES NAKURU / BOGORIA / BARINGO
safaris.description: Day 1 Nairobi - Masai Mara: Drive along the Rift Valley floor, lunch en route, arrive late afternoon at Maasai Mara. Day 2 Masai Mara: Full day searching for elephants, zebra, wildebeest, rhino, buffalo, lion, cheetah, leopard, overnight at base camp. Day 3 Masai Mara: Full day game viewing with picnic lunch, overnight at camp. Day 4 Masai Mara - Nakuru: Depart for Lake Nakuru, picnic lunch at Safari Junction, visit Lake Elementaita, overnight at Nakuru hotel. Day 5 Lakes Nakuru - Bogoria - Baringo: Drive to Lake Baringo via Lake Bogoria, picnic lunch, explore on foot, view flamingos, overnight at Baringo hotel or camp. Day 6 Lake Nakuru - Nairobi: Early morning game drive at Lake Nakuru, return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board accommodations at Sentrim/Mara Leisure/Ol Moran in Mara, Sentrim/Flamingo/Pelican Nakuru, Soi Safari Lodge Baringo.

safaris.title: 8 Days TREE HOTEL - SAMBURU - MT. KENYA - NAKURU - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Tree Hotel, Samburu, Mt Kenya, Nakuru, Masai Mara
safaris.description: Day 1 Tree Hotel: Drive north to Kenya's Central Highlands arriving in time for lunch at Aberdare National Park. After lunch at the base hotel, proceed for game watching and overnight [160 kms 3hrs]. Day 2 Samburu: Drive across equator to Samburu, lunch at Shaba Lodge, drive along Uaso Nyiro river, overnight [207 kms, 3.5 hrs]. Day 3 Samburu: Full day game viewing in rugged terrain. Day 4 Mt Kenya: Drive south to Nanyuki, overnight at lodge [137 kms, 2.5 hrs]. Day 5 Nakuru: Drive west across Aberdares to Lake Nakuru, lunch and game drive, overnight [137 kms, 2.5 hrs]. Day 6 Maasai Mara: Travel across Rift Valley to Masai Mara, afternoon game drive, overnight [315 kms, 3.5 hrs]. Day 7 Maasai Mara: Full day of wildlife viewing. Day 8 Nairobi: Return to Nairobi after breakfast, arriving at lunch [280 kms, 4.5 hrs]. Full board accommodations at Aberdare Country Club, Sentrim/Sopa Samburu, Sentrim/Pelican Nakuru, Nanyuki lodge, Sentrim/Ol Moran or Mara Leisure in Mara.

categories.title: Kenya Top Safari Requests
categories.description: Most requested safari programs and adventure activities

safaris.title: Lake Naivasha and Crescent Island
safaris.description: Your drive takes you down the escarpment and along the floor of the Rift Valley to the Lake Naivasha. Here successful vineyards produce much of Kenya's wine, have been established. After a guided tour, a buffet lunch consisting of local produce and wine beside the lake, a two hour boat ride takes you to a nearby island where you walk amongst the plains game and enjoy the bird life. Return to Nairobi after tea arriving in the early evening.

safaris.title: Lake Nakuru National Park
safaris.description: The great Rift Valley stretches from Ethiopia across Kenya to Tanzania. A chain of eight lakes, Lake Nakuru being one of the most famous. The Lake is only a few kilometers away from Nakuru, Kenya's 3rd largest town 160 km west of Nairobi. You will descend the escarpment into the dramatic landscape of the scenic Rift. You will be treated to an extensive tour of the park, with lunch being served in the park. The tour will focus on the bewildering spectacle of a million flamingos and the variety of wildlife with which the park abounds. Here, you will be treated to a melody of songs from a wide variety of birds. Drive back to Nairobi.

safaris.title: 2 Days AMBOSELI NATIONAL PARK
safaris.description: Day 1 Amboseli: Drive south through open ranch country leading deep into Maasai land. Enter Amboseli Park and proceed to lodge for lunch, game drive and overnight [250 kms 4hrs]. Day 2 Nairobi: Take an early morning game drive before clouds could shroud the snow capped summit of Kilimanjaro providing a magnificent backdrop for the wildlife. After breakfast return to Nairobi. Full board accommodations at Sentrim or kibo or Kilima Amboseli.

safaris.title: 3 Days MASAI MARA
safaris.description: Day 1 Maasai Mara: Driving to the escarpment descend into the Great Rift Valley and proceed to Narok. Enter Masai Mara Park in time for lunch, afternoon game drive and overnight. Day 2 Maasai Mara: Spend the day on the undulating hills and grasslands viewing the spectacular array of wildlife including antelopes, gazelles, provides of lions and other predators. Day 3 Nairobi: After a hearty breakfast, leave for Nairobi arriving before lunch. Full board accommodations at SENTRIM/ASHNIL/MARA MAISHA or Ol Moran or Mara Leisure.

safaris.title: 3 Days Tsavo East & West - Amboseli National Park
safaris.description: Day 1 Tsavo: Drive 100 Kms east to Tsavo east/West Park, home to the Red Elephant. Viewing game enroute to Ngulia/Kilaguni/Sentrim for lunch, dinner and overnight. Afternoon game drive. (165 Kms). Day 2 Amboseli: Proceed to Amboseli Park arriving in time for lunch at Kibo/Sentrim/Serena. Afternoon game drives in this swampy park with Natural Springs which attract wildlife. We have chances to see the snow capped top of Mt Kilimanjaro and also the Plains animals. Dinner and overnight at the Lodge, (240 Kms). Accommodation at Kibo or sentrim Amboseli. Day 3 Mombasa: Early morning game drives before Breakfast. After breakfast drive back to Mombasa. (135 Kms).

safaris.title: 4 Days LAKE NAKURU - LAKE NAIVASHA - MASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Lake Nakuru, Lake Naivasha, Masai Mara
safaris.description: Day 1 Nakuru: Drive through lush tea and coffee plantations near Limuru. Descend into the Great Rift Valley arriving at the famous bird sanctuary of Lake Nakuru Park. Afternoon game drive, before proceeding to your lodge for the night (160 kms, 3 hrs). Day 2 Maasai Mara: Early morning drive past the extinct volcano of Mt. Longonot. Arrive at the famous Maasai Mara for afternoon game drive and overnight (315 kms, 5 hrs). Day 3 Maasai Mara: Enjoy a day of uninterrupted game drive in this popular reserve renowned for its huge numbers of plains game such as wildebeest and zebra, and its majestic predators. Day 4 Nairobi: Bid farewell to the Mara as you return to Nairobi before lunch (280 kms, 4 1/2 hrs). Accommodations at Sentrim/Pelican Nakuru or Ol moran/Sentrim/Mara Leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: 6 Days AMBOSELI - LAKE NAIVASHA - NAKURU - MAASAI MARA
safaris.destination: Amboseli, Lake Naivasha, Nakuru, Masai Mara
safaris.description: DAY 1 Amboseli: Drive south through Maasai country to Amboseli Game Reserve arriving at the lodge in the time for lunch. Afternoon game view beneath the snow capped peak of Mount Kilimanjaro. Dinner and overnight at a Safari lodge. DAY 2 Amboseli: Dawn drive, returning to the lodge for breakfast. Rest for the morning at the leisure or by the swimming pool. Lunch and a fine game viewing drive in the late afternoon. Dinner and overnight at a Safari Lodge. DAY 3 Lake Naivasha: Early breakfast and proceed to Lake Naivasha with lunch enroute. Afternoon at leisure or by the lake or free for optional excursions. Dinner and overnight at Lake Naivasha Hotel. DAY 4 Maasai Mara: Depart for Maasai Mara Game Reserve after an early breakfast. Lunch at the lodge an afternoon game viewing drive in the reserve the borders the Serengeti Park in Tanzania. Dinner and overnight at a lodge or tented camp. DAY 5 Maasai Mara: Morning and afternoon game viewing in the reserve, noted for it's black maned lion and leopard. Dinner and overnight at a lodge or tented camp. DAY 6 NAIROBI: Return to Nairobi after breakfast. Full board at Sentrim/Kibo/Kilima amboseli and Pelican/Sentrim Naivasha and Senrim/Ol Moran/Mara leisure in Mara.

safaris.title: 4 Days MT. Kenya Hiking: SIRIMON OUT SIRIMON ROUTE
safaris.description: Day 1: NAIROBI – SIRIMON GATE – OLD MOSES: Depart Nairobi 7.00 am for Sirimon Park Gate. After park formalities trek for 9 KM (3-4) hours, 690 metres ascend to Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp. Day 2: OLD MOSES – SHIPTONS CAMP: Trek 14 KM about 6-7 hours 890 metres ascend to Shiptons Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp. Day 3: SUMMIT DAY: Trek 3-5 hours 755 Metres ascend to Point Lenana arriving early in the morning to witness the sunrise. Trek back to Old Moses Camp. Dinner and overnight at the camp. Day 4: OLD MOSES - NAIROBI: After breakfast descend further down to Sirimon Park Gate where you are transferred to Nairobi arriving in the evening.

safaris.title: 6 Days MT. Kenya Hiking: SIRIMON OUT CHOGORIA ROUTE
safaris.description: Day 1. NAIROBI - NANYUKI: Meet and greet at the Airport and later depart and drive North to Naromoru town and transferred to Mountain rock Hotel or Equivalent for dinner and overnight. Day 2. NANYUKI – SIRIMON GATE – OLD MOSES: Depart Nairobi or your base hotel and drive to sirimon park gate 2600 m and after park formalities hike to Judmeirs camp 3300m 3-4 hrs. Day 3. OLD MOSES – SHIPTONS CAMP: After b/fast hike to shiptons camp 4200m, the day is a bit long so we need a slow pace. Lunch en route, dinner/overnight at camp. 6-7hrs. Day 4. SHIPTONS CAMP: Stay at Shiptons Camp for another night to acclimatize and rest day. This makes the summit day much more enjoyable. Dinner and overnight at Shiptons Camp. Day 5. SUMMIT DAY – MERU BANDAS: Attempt point Lenana 4985m then down to hallstarn (mintos) for b/fast and go down to Meru Bandas. Lunch en route dinner and overnight at the lodge. 8-9 hrs. Day 6. MERU BANDAS - NAIROBI: After b/fast we hike down through dense bamboo and rain forest for 6 hrs to meet with our vehicle for transfer to chogoria town for lunch then proceed to Nairobi arriving in the evening. Later transferred to the Airport for your outbound flight.

safaris.title: 3 Days White Water RAFTING AND KAYAKING
safaris.description: Day 1. Sagana: Depart Nairobi to central Kenya at the slopes of Mt Kenya to Sagana town, the headquarters of water rafting in Kenya at The Tana River. Arrive in time for lunch. Afternoon rafting this biggest river in Kenya. Dinner and overnight at Savage Camp. Day 2. Sagana: In the morning after breakfast, do Water sport Kayaking and in the afternoon do Rock climbing. Have a sundowner dinner on the banks of this mighty river. Dinner and overnight at the camp. Day 3. Sagana: In the morning proceed for Mt Biking between 20 km – 40 kms. In the afternoon, engage in a stand-up puddle board for 2 hrs. Dinner and overnight at the camp.

safaris.title: SHIMONI, KISITE, WASINI AND CHALE ISLANDS
safaris.description: These islands are tucked away off the tourist beat and offer secluded resorts. Shimoni is the famous haunt for Diving and deep sea big-game fishing. The Shimoni caves were an old slave town, the Kisite Marine National Park consists of 4 reef islets hosting colorful sea life, and Wasini Island is an old Arab village renowned for its historical monuments and tombs.

safaris.title: LAMU
safaris.description: This is the oldest Kenyan city and one of the earliest Arab settlements along the coast. Lamu has preserved its architecture and a tempo reminiscent of the 18th century. The ambience is maintained by the absence of motor vehicles. Donkeys and dhows are still the common mode of transport. Skilled Lamu craftsmen create ornate doors and Arab chests which contribute to Lamu's unique identity.
highlights: Lamu Fort – Built between 1813 and 1821 in the southern corner of the old stone town. The fort is a massive multi-storey building with a central courtyard which has become an image of the Lamu community now being used for weddings, meetings and theatre.
Lamu Museum – The building was originally used by the British colonial government. It houses collections of ethnographic materials from the Swahili, Orma and Pokomo ethnic groups.

Kiunga Marine Park – Also known as 'Enchanted underwater world' the marine eco system incorporates a chain of about 50 calcareous offshore islands and coral reefs in the Lamu Archipelago, running parallel to the coastline for about 60 km and adjacent to Dodori and Boni forest Reserves on the mainland.
